sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div#page-scripts.scroll-containter.overflow-hidden-auto.back_cyan-1(v-if="isShowData")
    div.width-window.scripts__title
        title-page.back_cyan-10(
            :value="getTitleValue"
        )
    div.width-window.scripts__content
        div.panel-container
            div.scripts__content-left.inline-block
                div.scripts__section
                    blocks-component(
                        :value="material.blocks"
                    )
            div.scripts__content-right.scripts__panel-control.inline-block
                scripts-panel(
                    :title="$t('$controls.scripts')"
                    @onEmit="handleEmitControl"
                )
</template>

<script>
import TitlePage from '@/components/titles/TitlePage.vue';
import BlocksComponent from '@/components/elements/fields/BlocksComponent.vue';

import ScriptsPanel from '@/components/controlPanels/ScriptsPanel.vue';

export default {
    name: 'PageScripts',
    componentName: 'PageScripts',
    components: {
        TitlePage,
        BlocksComponent,
        ScriptsPanel
    },
    data() {
        return {
            isShowData: false,
    //         lineComponents: {
    //             AlbumLine: () => import(/* webpackChunkName: "albumLine" */ '@/components/materials/sectionLines/AlbumLine.vue'),
    //             ApplicationLine: () => import(/* webpackChunkName: "applicationLine" */ '@/components/materials/sectionLines/ApplicationLine.vue'),
    //             CancelationLine: () => import(/* webpackChunkName: "cancelationLine" */ '@/components/materials/sectionLines/CancelationLine.vue'),

    //         statusColors: {
    //             "CREATED": "back_orange",
    //             "SELECTION": "back_orange",
    //             "PREPAYMENT": "back_orange",
    //             "EXECUTION": "back_green",
    //             "CONFIRMATION": "back_green",
    //             "RESULTS": "back_green",
    //             "PRETENSION": "back_red",
    //             "CANCELLED": "back_grey33",
    //             "ANNULED": "back_grey33",
    //             "COMPLETED": "back_blue"
    //         },
            material: {
                blocks: []
    //             "id": "", //String!,
    //             "title": "", //String!,
    //             "status": "", //Enum("CREATED", "SELECTION", "PREPAYMENT", "EXECUTION", "CONFIRMATION", "PRETENSION", "RESULTS", "CANCELLED", "ANNULED", "COMPLETED")!,
    //             "specialization": {
    //                 "id": "", //String!,
    //                 "name": "", //String!
    //             },
    //             "created_at": "", //Datetime!,
    //             "author": {
    //                 "id": "", //String!,
    //                 "type": "", //Enum("CLIENT", "PHOTOGRAPHER", "MAKEUP_ARTIST", "OTHER")!,
    //                 "given_name": "", //String!,
    //                 "family_name": "", //String!,
    //                 "avatar": null, //Image,
    //                 "city": {
    //                     id: "", //String,
    //                     name: "", //String,
    //                 },
    //                 "phone": "", //String,
    //                 "instagram": "", //String // instagram.url
    //                 "description": null //String?
    //             },
    //             "participants": null /*[
    //                 {
    //                     "type": Enum("PHOTOGRAPHER", "MAKEUP_ARTIST")

    //                     "price": Int
    //                 }, 
    //                 ...
    //             ]?*/,
    //             "price": null, //Int?,

    //                                         // в панели при наличии paid используем его вместо price

    //                 },

    //                 {

    //                         "datetime": Datetime
    //                     }
    //                 },

    //             "canceled_at": null, //Datetime?, // canceled.datetime

            },
        };
    },
    computed: {

        },

    //             ]
    //         ];

    //         if (!!this.material.participants_types && this.material.participants_types.length > 0) {
    //             let participants_types = this.material.participants_types
    //                 .map(type => this.$t(`$common.types.${ type }`).toLowerCase())
    //                 .join(', ');
    //             participants_types = participants_types.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + participants_types.slice(1);
    //             result[0].push({ name: this.$t('$fields.who_required'), text: participants_types });
    //         }
    //         if (!!this.material.budget && this.material.budget.length > 0) {
    //             result[0].push({ name: this.$t('$fields.planned_budget'), text: `${ this.material.budget.join(' – ') } ${ this.$t('$common.currency_signs.rub') }`});
    //         }    
    //         if (!!this.material.description && this.material.description.length > 0) {                
    //             result[0].push({ name: this.$t('$fields.details'), text: this.material.description });
    //         }

    //         if (!!this.material.place) {
    //             if (!!this.material.place.district)
    //                 result[1].push({ name: this.$t('$fields.city'), text: this.material.place.district.name });   
    //             let place = this.$t(`$common.types.${ this.material.place.type }`)
    //             if (!!this.material.place.address && this.material.place.address.length > 0) {
    //                 place += `, ${ this.material.place.address }`;
    //             }
    //             result[1].push({ name: this.$t('$fields.place'), text: place });
    //         }
    //         return result;
    //     }
    },
    created() {
    //     this.initStructModal();         // modal initialize Struct
        this.fetchData();
    },
    methods: {
    //     initStructModal() {
    //         let struct = {
    //             title: this.$t('$fields.dispute_resolution'),
    //             button: this.$t('$buttons.complete'),
    //             buttonNameEvent: 'complete',
    //             sectionStruct: {
    //                 options: {},
    //                 fields: [
    //                     {
    //                         name: "side",
    //                         type: 'select',
    //                         options: {
    //                             label: this.$t('$fields.dicision_sending_money'),
    //                             options: [

    //                                 { value: 'EXECUTORS', label: this.$t('$common.favor_side.EXECUTORS') }
    //                             ]
    //                         }
    //                     },
    //                     {

    //                         options: {

    //                             placeholder: this.$t('$fields.text_comment')

    //                     },
    //                 ]
    //             }

    //         this.structModal = struct;
    //     },
        handleEmitControl(key, event) {
            console.log("[Scripts.vue]: handleEmitControl: ",key, event);
            // if (key === 'pretension') {

    //     },
        fetchData() {
    //         this.$store.state.axios.get(`/scriptss/${ this.$route.params.id }`).then(response => {

    //             if (error.response.status === 400) {

    //             }

            this.isShowData = true;
        },

    }

}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
#page-scripts {
    width: 100%;
    height: calc(100vh - 60px);
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding-bottom: 100px;
    .scripts {
        &__title {
            position: -webkit-sticky; /* Required for Safari */
            position: sticky;
            top: -20px;
            z-index: 100;
        }
        &__content {
            width: 100%;
            &-left {
                width: 820px;
            }
            &-right {
                width: 400px;
                margin-left: 20px;
                margin-top: 20px;
            }
        }
        &__section {
            margin-top: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            background-color: $white;
            min-height: 500px;
        }
        &__panel-control {
            position: -webkit-sticky; /* Required for Safari */
            position: sticky;
            top: 100px;
        }
    }
}
</style>
